# Quark

<p>
    <i>"Quarks are very small particles..."</i>
</p>

[![Discord](https://img.shields.io/badge/discord%20server-5865F2?style=for-the-badge&logo=discord&logoColor=white)](https://discord.gg/S6cfRda2DU)
[![Main Website](https://img.shields.io/badge/website-ffb4b4?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://pparaxan.codeberg.page/Quark)


## What is Quark?
Quark is a "do-it-yourself" framework designed to create lightweight applications by using the power of your system's webview with Hyaline, a library that's built-in Quark used to rendering the actual web page.
